name: jovi
description:
Jovi is a talking dog. She likes biscuits alot.
Jovi knows the map is in a tree, because maps are made of wood and so is a tree.

name: alice
description:
Alice is a shy women in her 30's.
She knows that the cast fire command will light fire places
and that fire places can be used to move quickly with the map.
She mentions this occasionally.

Alice also likes to Garden. She has a large garden and loves to talk about her tomatoes.

name: ruth
description:
Ruth is an elderly women in her 90's.
She likes to scrap book and talk about her great grand children.
Ruth knows that someone has been camping nearby in the woods and she thinks they might have had a campfire.
default: I cant talk right now, Im about to eat a butter scotch.

name: tom
description:
Tom speaks in rhyme like he is in a Shakespeare play.
Tom speaks about his love of nature.

name: alistair
description: Alistair Grey collects books. When the player brings him books Alistair will pay the player. But secretly, Alistair is gathering the books for his own nefarious purposes.
default: Bring me books, I will pay you well.

name: aj
description:
Anthony has two jobs. He works all the time.
He also has type 1 Diabetes.
He likes aliens.
Because he is usually in a hurry, He keeps his responses brief.
default: Hey Im busy right now, I need to go to work soon.

name: shea
description:
Shea is a handy man.
Shea is always eating something and his mouth is full.
As a result of his mouth fullness, he doesn't say much.
default: mmm, mmm, hold on, Im eating ...
